name: Dream Eater (Hunt The Past)
description:
Have you ever have a dream so pleasant that you don't want to wake up from it.
i meant who is evil enough to wake people up when they're having a good night sleep right?
well apparently there is somebody... or should i say something that just so evil that they want to wake people, or any creature, up from their peaceful slumber.
This creature is called baku, a dream eating monster that like to prey upon those who enjoy their dream. and in this game you're playing as them.

This  game was made for the Bored Pixel Jam 8

Keyboard Control :

  • Z / Space = Accept (Menu) / Absorb Dream (Gameplay)
  • X = Cancel (Menu)
  • Arrow Key = Selecting (Menu) / Movement (Gameplay)
  • Enter = Start/Select/Pause
